label: 安主
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Middle-level officer of a noble family's administrative headquarters (mandokoro); often involved with preparing documents or recording decisions. Performed such duties for the Kamakura Bakufu's mandokoro. Also, an administrative officer within a shōen or provincial headquarters (kokuga).　[政所、国衙]
